snippet.title: Alkan, Charles-Valentin
snippet.description: * Alkan, Charles-Valentin (clueweb12-0204wb-43-23544) http://www.naxoslicensing.com/performer/17622/ Alkan, Charles-Valentin Alkan, Charles-Valentin (11/30/1813 - 3/29/1888 ) Alkan, born Morhange in Paris in 1813, was among the most gifted piano virtuosi of his time.
